text: Le Mérévillois is a commune. It is in Île-de-France in the Essonne department in north France. It was created on 1 January 2019 and consists of the former communes of Estouches and Méréville (the seat).Arrêté préfectoral 28 September 2018 == References == Category:2019 establishments in France Category:Communes in Essonne
title: Le Mérévillois
